about_the_game:
You are Vladimir Lenin, a ditzy Russian revolutionary, politician and political theorist. You’ve had a crush on your childhood friend Stalin ever since you were a little kid. Your crush invites you over for popsicles at her place. It’s your chance. What will you do?

Attempt to choose the right dialog options to reach the true ending with your crush Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin in this visual novel full of trials and tribulations! Your choices matter. Will you make it out alive and get a kiss with your crush in this alternate universe where you are a cute communist anime girl? :3

My Dictator Stalin Can't be This Cute?! is a visual novel where your choices determine your fate. As a charming, anime-style version of Vladimir Lenin, navigate through complex dialogue options that test your wit and resolve. Each choice could lead to a sweet romantic ending or a disastrous downfall. Will you earn the love of your dashing comrade, or will history repeat itself in chaos? Your choices matter, and the ultimate challenge awaits: can you guide Lenin to the true ending?

Features:

  • Breathtaking gameplay
  • Mind-breaking gameplay
  • Cute anime girls
  • Historically accurate (?) story
  • Yuri
  • 10 Bad Endings
  • 1 True Ending

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of violence and explicit sexual content.
